The icons and the drill suggest a task related to the items shown. Given the setup, it's likely the man is about to attempt a challenge, but there's no indication he has passed any yet. Therefore, the options suggesting he has passed challenges (A, B, C) are not supported by this segment. Option D suggests he passed one challenge, but there's no evidence of completion. Option Z, 
o right option,seems plausible as there's no confirmation of any challenges passed.
